title: Emilio Largo

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
You may choose to antiframe another SPECTRE member, making them appear innocent until investigated.
You choose which role they appear as. You can only choose good roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: If anyone investigates any SPECTRE member, you are notified of the role who investigated them.

fields.name: Scheme:
fields.value:
**Never Say Never Again:**
Unless all non-SPECTRE members agree to privately and unanimously agree to forward all remaining charges of limited use abilities to SPECTRE, then half the remaining town, SPECTRE members excluded, will instantly be dealt an overkill attack. They may anonymously talk amongst themselves regarding the deal, and must come to a decision prior to the start of the next day.

desc:
Post 4420
*You wish to put the evil eye on me, eh? We have a way to deal with that where I come from.*
